club1.name: Husky Game Dev Club
club1.description: Husky Game Dev is a student organization aimed at supporting indie game development at the Bothell campus of the University of Washington. Our goal is to provide a community, educational opportunities, and resources for UWB students to learn skills related to game development and connect with industry professionals.
club1.jams: Every quarter, Husky Game Dev holds a game jam that gives students an incentive to get coding and developing games for fun! This is a perfect opportunity for you to form teams, brainstorm ideas, and make your game ideas come to life!
club1.events: Learn more about game development with Husky Game Dev through our workshops! We will walk you through skills that will teach you how to be a game developer and designer.
